          <title>
            <string language="en">Mass measurement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Massenmessen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mesure de masse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Medida maciça</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Misura totale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαζική μέτρηση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Medida total</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These illustrations show an incorrectly zeroed balance (left) and incorrectly calibrated balance (right).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">calibration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">digital balances</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">kilograms</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">weight</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">zero</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildungen zeigen eine falsch auf Null 
eingestellte Balance (nach links) und kalibrierten falsch die Balance 
(recht).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces illustrations montrent un équilibre 
inexactement mis à zéro (à gauche) et ont inexactement calibré 
l'équilibre (droit).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estas ilustrações mostram um contrapeso 
incorretamente zerado (à esquerda) e calibraram incorretamente o 
contrapeso (direito).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Queste illustrazioni mostrano un equilibrio in 
modo errato azzerato (a sinistra) ed in modo errato hanno calibrato 
l'equilibrio (di destra).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτές οι απεικονίσεις εμφανίζουν μια ανακριβώς 
μηδενισμένη ισορροπία (αριστερά) και ανακριβώς βαθμολογημένη 
ισορροπία (δεξιά).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estas ilustraciones muestran un equilibrio 
incorrectamente puesto a cero (a la izquierda) y calibraron 
incorrectamente el balance (derecho).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kalibrierung</string>
          </keyword>
